text: Surender Sodhi (often credited as Surendra Sodhi) is an Indian film score composer.https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1262554/ He has composed background scores for notable Hindi films like Deewana, Soldier, Raja Hindustani, Baadshah, Hera Pheri and Special 26. ==Partial filmography as Background Score Composer== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
